creator: apache.org@schildbach.de
text:
the enhancement would be the capability to send attachment(s) with the Mail 
task (does not seem to be possible at the moment).

creator: glenn_twiggs@bmc.com
text:
Attachments can be sent using the optional MimeMail task. The classname 
is "org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.optional.net.MimeMail". The doc for it can be 
found in the CVS tree here: http://cvs.apache.org/viewcvs/~checkout~/jakarta-
ant/docs/manual/OptionalTasks/mimemail.html?rev=1.1&content-type=text/html 
(this doc is not available from the documentation link on the Ant homepage). 
Since the functionality is already available, I've marked this as FIXED. (I 
hope this is ok)
